Entry.JapaneseText: カイル
Entry.EnglishText: Kyle

Entry.JapaneseText: ヴェイグ
Entry.EnglishText: Veigue

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア
Entry.EnglishText: Claire

Entry.JapaneseText: アニス
Entry.EnglishText: Anise

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、聞いていい？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, can I ask you something?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What is it?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうかしたの？
Entry.EnglishText: Is something wrong?

Entry.JapaneseText: 英雄って知ってる？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you know what a hero is?

Entry.JapaneseText: …それって神話か何かの話？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that like something from mythology or something?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうじゃなくってさ、 世界の危機を救うような活躍をした 英雄と呼ばれるような人だよ
Entry.EnglishText: No, I mean a person who did something to save the world from a crisis, someone you'd call a hero.

Entry.JapaneseText: …知らないな。 世界の危機が起こったのは かれこれ数百年昔の事だ
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know...the last world crisis was hundreds of years ago.

Entry.JapaneseText: ○○が…、ディセンダーが かつていた過去の時代よね？
Entry.EnglishText: ○○... The Descenders were from a past era, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 覚えていない
Entry.EnglishText: I don't remember.

Entry.JapaneseText: その通りだ
Entry.EnglishText: That's right.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう…だったわね
Entry.EnglishText: Yes...that's how it was.

Entry.JapaneseText: といってもその記憶が 残っているわけじゃないんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: But you don't actually have those memories, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか…、やっぱり英雄はいないのか
Entry.EnglishText: I see... So, there really are no heroes.

Entry.JapaneseText: まあ、父さん母さんはともかく、 ウッドロウさんぐらいは有名でも おかしくないのにな…
Entry.EnglishText: Well, aside from my parents, someone like Woodrow is, at least, famous...

Entry.JapaneseText: でもでもっ！ ウッドロウさんはすっごいお金持ちみたい！
Entry.EnglishText: But, but! Woodrow seems to be super rich!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の情報によると、 自費でいくつものギルドを立ち上げたって 話だよ
Entry.EnglishText: According to my information, he founded several guilds with his own money.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの人なら、市民の生活の為に それぐらいやっちゃうよ
Entry.EnglishText: He definitely would do something like that for the sake of the citizens.

Entry.JapaneseText: つまり、よっぽどの金余りって事じゃん！☆ はわぁ〜〜〜〜！ すっごい！ こりゃ狙い目っ
Entry.EnglishText: So, he must have plenty of cash! Wow! What a golden chance!

Entry.JapaneseText: すごい熱意ね。 あれを別の事に向ければ、 アニスだって英雄になれるかも
Entry.EnglishText: Such enthusiasm. If you directed that towards something else, even you, Anise, could become a hero.

Entry.JapaneseText: 有名人にはなれるかも…
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe I'll become famous...
